audioText: Elle s'est réveillée très tôt ce matin pour préparer son examen important de fin d'année universitaire.
question: When did she wake up this morning?
options: Very early to prepare for her important exam
Late because she forgot about the test
At her usual time for regular classes
In the afternoon after studying all night
explanation: The text states 'Elle s'est réveillée très tôt ce matin pour préparer son examen important de fin d'année universitaire.' - 'She woke up very early this morning to prepare for her important end-of-year university exam.' The past participle 'réveillée' agrees with the feminine subject and comes from 'réveiller' (to wake up).
